name: S4
body:
### What is S4?
The [Self-Service Semantic Suite (S4)](http://s4.ontotext.com) from Ontotext provides a set of components for self-service, on-demand, and low-cost semantic data management and analytics:
* text analytics services for news, Life Science and social media that allow you to extract valuable meaning and insights used to manage your business
* on-demand, fast and reliable access to Linked Datasets, such as DBpedia, Freebase and GeoNames. These datasets provide facts you can use to enhance your semantic analysis.
* a self-managed or fully-managed scalable RDF database available as-a-service, so that you can search and update semantic facts loaded from Linked Open Data or your own documents

### Source Code
Various add-ons, demos and sample code related to S4 are available as open source in the [S4 GitHub repository](https://github.com/Ontotext-AD/S4). The supporting documentation is available at http://docs.s4.ontotext.com/

### Contact Us
Check out the S4 documentation at http://docs.s4.ontotext.com/ or get in touch with the S4 team via [email](mailto:s4-info@ontotext.com), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ontotext_S4) or the [support desk](http://s4ontotext.zendesk.com/).
